title: League unable to start
body:
Every time I click on the league shortcut to get to the launch screen it doesn't open , instead I get this message.
Edit1:
 https://embed.gyazo.com/0d54212ca39a04c7c3751f4f4deb2a3a.png
Now it changed.
Edit2:
More changes... bad or good? Ill re install league for the 2nd time :P (Reinstalling did nothiing)
https://i.gyazo.com/751a651dab0918f0d75f8009345ed184.png
Edit3: 
Im not sure if this means anything but your file was included :C
https://gyazo.com/b7c220714428dc7d9b49fa37ba1e34e1.jpg
Edit4: 
Hearthstone seems to be the only other application that doesn't work.

replies.body: This may be due to a security issue that's blocking the game from launching or scanning files.  I suggest starting out with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that the patcher and client have permissions to launch.  Hopefully, this will do the trick!
